items.name: of

comment.description: generates high-quality documentation for given code, providing information on page number, size, total pages, and total elements.

params.name: pageable
params.description: pageable object that contains information about the current page being processed, including its page number and size.

params.name: page
params.description: current page of data being processed, providing the total elements and number of pages for the `PageInfo` object to calculate and return.
